name: 2018/11/08 Dinner Mackerel
description: This '2018/11/08 Dinner Mackerel' recipe is perfect for those looking for a healthy meal option. It's high in protein and low in both carbs and sugar, making it an ideal choice for anyone wanting to maintain a balanced diet. Enjoy a delicious, healthified recipe that's sure to satisfy your taste buds without compromising on nutrition.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Mackerel (Saba Fish) under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Place the Mackerel on a lightly greased baking tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
